doc:description.doc:para: net.sourceforge.KToshiba is a DBus interface implemented by KToshiba. It allows to change the keyboard backlight mode and timeout as well as toggling the touchpad and eco mode led state (if the laptop supports such features).

doc:doc.doc:summary: Get the value of the TouchPad. Returns false when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Get the state of the TouchPad.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while getting the TouchPad state

doc:doc.doc:summary: Set the value of the TouchPad. Does nothing when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Set the state of the TouchPad from on to off and viceversa.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while setting the TouchPad state

doc:doc.doc:summary: Get the value of the ECO mode led. Returns false when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Get the state of the ECO mode led.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while getting the ECO mode led state

doc:doc.doc:summary: Set the value of the ECO mode led. Does nothing when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Set the state of the ECO mode led from on to off and viceversa.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while setting the ECO mode led state

doc:doc.doc:summary: Get the value of the Illumination led. Returns false when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Get the state of the Illumination led.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while getting the Illumination led state

doc:doc.doc:summary: Set the value of the Illumination led. Does nothing when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Set the state of the Illumination led from on to off and viceversa.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while setting the Illumination led state

doc:doc.doc:summary: The value of the keyboard backlight type. Returns Zero when not supported.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while getting the keyboard backlight type

doc:doc.doc:summary: The value of the keyboard backlight mode. Returns Zero when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Get the keyboard backlight mode of operation.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while getting the keyboard backlight mode

doc:doc.doc:summary: The value of the keyboard backlight mode. Does nothing when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Changes the keyboard backlight mode of operation.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while changing the keyboard backlight mode

doc:doc.doc:summary: The timeout of the keyboard backlight. Returns 0 when not supported and when keyboard backlight mode is not set to AUTO or TIMER.

doc:description.doc:para: Get the timeout value for the keyboard backlight.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while getting the keyboard backlight timeout

doc:doc.doc:summary: The timeout of the keyboard backlight. Does nothing when not supported.

doc:description.doc:para: Set the timeout value for the keyboard backlight.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while setting the keyboard backlight timeout

doc:doc.doc:summary: The HDD protection level. Returns -1 when not supported.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while getting the HDD protection level

doc:doc.doc:summary: The HDD protection level. Does nothing when not supported.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while setting the HDD protection level
